medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The abdominal pain started yesterday, is across her entire abdomen, and has worsened. The patient has experienced a few episodes of vomiting, decreased oral intake, and chills. She denies diarrhea, black or bloody stool, vaginal bleeding, or discharge, dysuria, and hematuria.
medical_history.family_history: No history of inflammatory bowel disease or gastrointestinal malignancy.
